milestones: 'Fascinating' and 'provocative' research examines genetic elements of bipolar, schizophrenia
Israel buys nuclear capable subs

duck: Locus (genetics), the position of a gene (or other significant sequence) on a chromosome
locus definition: the place where something is situated or occurs.
Locus (mathematics), the set of points satisfying a particular condition, often forming a curve
Locus of control, in industrial psychology, having an internal or external locus of control
